original_text: But you must be very careful to obey the rules and the laws that Moses gave to you. You must love the Lord your God. You must obey the rules and commands that he has given to us. You must worship him and serve him with everything that you have.’
korean_text: 오직 여호와의 종 모세가 너희에게 명령한 명령과 율법을 반드시 행하여 너희의 하나님 여호와를 사랑하고 그의 모든 길로 행하며 그의 계명을 지켜 그에게 친근히 하고 너희의 마음을 다하며 성품을 다하여 그를 섬길지니라 하고

sentences.original_text: But you must be very careful
to obey the rules and the laws
You must love the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 하나님 주님을 사랑해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: You must obey the rules and commands
that he has given to us
and serve him with everything that you have
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 가진 모든 것으로 그를 섬기십시오
